name: Collect All Items: LEGO Microgame
description:
Collect All Items: LEGO Microgame

PC Game

Platformer

E

Ages 6+, casual gamers

This game is designed as a platformer where the user controls a minifigure to collect all the items. Once collected, game is won! However, there are several contraptions and obstacles to avoid along the way.

Use WASD to move character and mouse to turn character around. Spacebar is used to jump while double tapping the spacebar will increase height of jump.

Zack Mattie - Game Designer
